items.name: Funding for the team to continue developing Nerman up to Dec 31, 2023
items.description: ETH funding for team salaries and expenses

items.name: Provide and maintain access to events across the Nouniverse
items.description: Index on-chain Nouns data for complicated analysis

items.name: Develop a way for automated Nouns DAO prop discussions using forums
items.description: Automatically create new threads for each proposal

items.name: Add all Nerman.js events to allow easy Discord notifications
items.description: Experiment with different feed ideas using events

description: Nerman.js aims to continue development of Nerman's bots and libraries, focusing on Nerman.js (Nouns SDK) and Nounish event feeds for Discord. The proposal seeks funding to support the team's efforts up to Dec 31, 2023, and all code will be open source under a permissive license.

project.name: Nerman.js
project.description: Nerman was funded by Nouns DAO through Prop 77. The team has been programming Nerman's bots and libraries, providing type-safe access to Nouns DAO contract events, and custom events. The goal is to become a canonical source of knowledge about the Nouniverse and provide extensive documentation to help developers interact with Nouns contracts and projects.

title: Nerman.js
